Texts.Eng: I'll lend a hand getting you off this world, but you'll need to get your hands dirty! Start by ^orange;building a Machining Table^reset; in your ^green;[C]rafting menu^reset;.
That's great workmanship, actually. I sense a keen mind in you. Your ship will be ^orange;space-worthy^reset; in no time at all! Let's move on to your next task!
